translation: (jhadkis mạdans mnz) tyzdvrn valyn guryn hund qsm yim phvunkan chih.
Pth yim knyn pytth pddr dạrith dith tymbri chih tulan.
Pth yim ṣbḥ spdane (dshmns pytth) achank ḥmlh chih kran.
Pth chih tim tath (ḥmlh vajinhi) jayhi gr di ghubar tulan.
Pth chih tim tamy vqth (dshmn sndis) lshkrs mnz aaczan.
Be shk chuh ansan pnnis rb sund sytthhe nashkrgzar.
Th yqyna chuh suh aath (nashkry) pytth panh gvah.
Th be shk chuh suh mal kis mḥbts mnz varyah skht.
Tylhi kya ts chhana pe yylhi tim (mord) tulnh yin yim qbrn mnz chih?
Th (raz) yin nnụ̄ krrnh yim syinn mnz chih?
Be shk āshi tihund rb tamhi doh timn (hndyv aʿmalv) nishhi var pạtthụ̄ bakhbr.
